detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected secretNumber = uint8(sha3()(now,block.blockhash(block.number - 1))) % 20 + 1 (Benchmarks/Study_SamplesSet/0970ec7cf5331089986386e015e189a9.sol#39):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
